mapper.sql: SELECT fuelNo, category, perLiter, payment, liter, regDate, location, content, historyNo FROM Fuel
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Fuel (historyNo, category, perLiter, payment, liter, regDate, location, content) VALUES (#{historyNo}, #{category}, #{perLiter}, #{payment}, #{liter}, #{regDate}, #{location}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT ch.*, f.* FROM Member m JOIN Car c ON m.memberno = c.memberno JOIN Carhistory ch ON ch.carindex = c.carindex JOIN Fuel f ON ch.historyno = f.historyno WHERE m.memberno = #{memberno}
